topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Fruit
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite fruit and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 請說出你喜歡的水果名稱、顏色、味道，以及喜歡它的理由，約3到5句。
topics.sample: My favorite fruit is mango. It is yellow and very sweet. I like it because it tastes fresh and juicy. I often eat it in summer. It makes me feel happy.

topics.title: Talk About Feeling Hungry
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt very hungry and what you did.
topics.hint: 談論你何時感到餓、當時的感受，以及你吃了什麼，3-5句即可。
topics.sample: Yesterday, I was very hungry after school. I didn't have dinner yet. So, I ate a sandwich. It made me feel better and full.

topics.title: Explain Why Sharing Is Important
topics.prompt: Explain why sharing things with others is important.
topics.hint: 說明分享的重要性，可以提到朋友、快樂或友誼，約4句。
topics.sample: Sharing is important because it helps us make friends and feel happy. When I share food, others feel cared for. It also shows kindness. Sharing makes everyone smile.

topics.title: Tell a Short Story About Finding Something
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a time you found something interesting.
topics.hint: 描述你找到某物的經歷，說出物品、當時的地點和感覺，約4至5句。
topics.sample: One day, I found a small toy in the park. It was colorful and shiny. I was excited to find it. I showed it to my friends and we played together.

topics.title: Describe How You Hide When Playing Games
topics.prompt: Describe how you hide during a game like hide-and-seek.
topics.hint: 說明你玩捉迷藏時，選擇藏身的地方和感覺，約3~4句。
topics.sample: When I play hide-and-seek, I like to hide behind big trees. It makes me feel safe and quiet. Sometimes, I hide under the table too. It is fun to surprise others.

topics.title: Talk About Your Morning Routine
topics.prompt: Describe what you do every morning after waking up.
topics.hint: 說明你起床後做的事，例如吃早餐、刷牙等，3至5句為佳。
topics.sample: Every morning, I wake up at 7 o'clock. First, I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then, I eat breakfast, usually eggs and toast. After that, I get ready for school.

topics.title: Share Your Thoughts About Bananas
topics.prompt: Talk about bananas and why people might like or dislike them.
topics.hint: 描述香蕉的外觀、味道，並分享你或他人喜歡或不喜歡香蕉的理由，3-4句。
topics.sample: Bananas are long and yellow. They taste sweet and soft. Many people like bananas because they are healthy and easy to eat. Some may not like the mushy texture.

topics.title: Describe a Funny Moment
topics.prompt: Describe a funny moment that happened to you or someone you know.
topics.hint: 敘述一件讓你覺得好笑的事情，可以是自己的或別人的經歷，約3~5句。
topics.sample: One time, my friend slipped on a banana peel during recess. Everyone laughed, including him. It was funny but he was okay. We still talk about it sometimes.

topics.title: Imagine You Have Many Fruits
topics.prompt: Imagine you have many fruits. Talk about what you would do with them.
topics.hint: 想像你擁有很多水果，可以說你會分享、做什麼食物或送給誰，約4句。
topics.sample: If I had many fruits, I would share them with my family and friends. I might also make fruit salad. Giving fruits to others makes me happy. Fruits are healthy snacks.

topics.title: Explain How To Say 'Thank You'
topics.prompt: Explain when and why we say 'thank you' in English.
topics.hint: 說明說謝謝的時機和原因，可以提到禮貌和感謝，3-4句。
topics.sample: We say 'thank you' when someone helps us or gives us something. It shows good manners and respect. Saying thank you makes people feel appreciated. It is important to be polite.
